item.title: resume (wip)
item.description: look, I'm gonna level with you. I haven't updated my resume in years. One day I’ll make a typst template or something and it’ll be great (my LaTeX template has collected dust) but this is all you get for now: emailarun@arun.gggithubgithub.com/Arunscapelinkedinlinkedin.com/in/arun-woosaree Work Experience (2023 - Present) ATB Financial react salesforce python playwright (2022) General Dynamics C++ radios C# Devops gitlab (2018-2020) ATB Financial (University Co-op student) react java express.js gcp enterprise content management python api testing gitlab Education University of Alberta Bsc.
